data.actual_result: OBS throws an error in your console each time you open/close it
data.expected_result: OBS opens and closes just fine
data.short_description: Opening/closing OBS Studio while Fortnite is open throws an error in your console
data.steps_to_repro: - Have Discord open on your computer - Open Fortnite on your computer - Open up your console - Open OBS Studio, and observe your console - Close OBS Studio and observe your console again - Note: This also happens if you have OBS Studio open first, and then open Fortnite
